Merchant of Mammon:
May the blessing of Mammon be with you! We, merchants of Mammon, travel all over the mainland, selling rare goods.
Here are a couple of instructions for you! We used to accept only ancient adena, and now, like the rest of the traders, we use the usual ones. To purchase the Scroll of Modification, you will need Clean Scroll . And still you can collect a full-fledged Soul Crystal, if you bring fragments of the Soul Crystal. I have everything I need to improve: Elsium and related items, a new Life Stone and a special Talisman. .
Do not forget to check the price of the items. Goods in this territory are taxed.
